TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExactCountOperator extends NUnit.Framework.Constraints.CollectionOperator

Docs.summary: Represents a constraint that succeeds if the specified count of members of a collection match a base constraint.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class NUnit.Framework.Constraints.Constraint ApplyPrefix(class NUnit.Framework.Constraints.Constraint constraint) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a constraint that will apply the argument to the members of a collection, succeeding if none of them succeed.
